title: Finance for a Sustainable Future: Carbon monetization - Deloitte
summary: The article discusses the role of finance within organizations in achieving net zero emissions by 2050, emphasizing the importance of gathering capabilities to drive carbon monetization and develop sustainability goals. It highlights the potential for cost savings from renewable energy sources and the growth opportunities through new products.
green_innovation: TRUE, because it focuses on achieving net zero emissions and developing sustainability goals, contributing to environmental sustainability.
business_innovation: FALSE, because the article does not describe a specific new or improved product or business process; rather, it discusses organizational capabilities and strategies.
green_product: FALSE, as no specific green product is mentioned in the article.
green_process: TRUE, because it discusses the processes that finance can implement to help achieve sustainability and net zero emissions, aligning with green process definitions.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 541611 - Administrative Management and General Management Consulting Services, 562910 - Remediation Services, 311118 - Other Food Crops Grown Under Cover, 541620 - Environmental Consulting Services.
greenwashing: FALSE, as the article appears to genuinely promote strategies for achieving sustainability instead of making misleading claims.
